text: Moosa ne kaha, â€œaccha to jaa, ab zindagi bhar tujhey yahi pukarte rehna hai ke mujhey na choona aur tere liye baaz-purs ka ek waqt muqarrar hai jo tujhse hargiz na taleyga aur dekh apne is khuda ko jispar tu richa (cherished so much) hua tha, ab hum usey jala daalenge aur reza reza karke dariya mein baha denge
